name: Example Company
description: AI-powered code completion and refactoring tool
ideal_creator: Coding tutorial channels, software engineering educators
audience: Beginner to intermediate developers, CS students
pain_point: Writing boilerplate code takes too much time
why_sponsor: Dev tutorial audience actively seeks productivity tools

name: Zoho
niches: business, productivity, CRM, email marketing, small business
description: Complete business suite - CRM, email, projects, HR, finance - 45+ apps
ideal_creator: Small business channels, entrepreneurship content, productivity tips
audience: Small business owners, entrepreneurs, solopreneurs, startup founders
pain_point: Need multiple tools for business, expensive subscriptions, complex integrations
why_sponsor: Huge SMB audience, proven in India/Asia, affordable alternative to US tools

name: Freshworks
niches: business, customer support, CRM, sales, IT service
description: Customer service, CRM, and ITSM software - Freshdesk, Freshsales, Freshservice
ideal_creator: Business channels, SaaS tutorials, customer service training, startup content
audience: Small to mid-size businesses, support teams, sales teams, IT teams
pain_point: Poor customer support tools, expensive enterprise software, complex setup
why_sponsor: Fast-growing market, competes with Zendesk, strong Indian connection

name: Razorpay
niches: fintech, e-commerce, business, entrepreneurship, online business
description: Payment gateway, banking, lending - complete financial stack for online businesses
ideal_creator: E-commerce tutorials, online business channels, fintech content, startup advice
audience: Online business owners, e-commerce sellers, SaaS founders, Indian entrepreneurs
pain_point: Complex payment integration, high fees, limited banking features, paperwork
why_sponsor: HUGE Indian e-commerce market, every online business needs payments

name: Postman
niches: coding, API development, backend, software engineering, DevOps
description: API platform for building, testing, and documenting APIs
ideal_creator: Backend development channels, API tutorials, software engineering education
audience: Backend developers, API developers, software engineers, DevOps engineers
pain_point: API testing is manual, documentation is outdated, team collaboration on APIs
why_sponsor: Industry standard tool, developer audience, Indian unicorn success story

name: CleverTap
niches: mobile apps, marketing, user engagement, retention, analytics
description: Mobile marketing platform for user engagement, retention, and analytics
ideal_creator: Mobile app development channels, growth marketing content, app monetization
audience: Mobile app developers, growth marketers, product managers, app founders
pain_point: User retention is hard, push notifications poorly targeted, fragmented analytics
why_sponsor: Mobile-first market in India/Asia, every app needs retention tools

name: Chargebee
description: Subscription billing and revenue management for SaaS and subscription businesses
ideal_creator: SaaS tutorial channels, subscription business content, entrepreneurship
audience: SaaS founders, subscription business owners, finance teams, growth teams
pain_point: Subscription billing is complex, revenue recognition, failed payments, dunning
why_sponsor: SaaS boom in India, every subscription business needs this
